post.body: Hi, Therese. Heard you in an audio w/MP, and it appears ur my wife's new pal. Allow myself to introduce... myself.
but isn't a 54 year old Hawaiian the equivalent of a 32 year old stateside?
ah, yes. the ol' bagel belly. Been snowed in here in WA, raining now tho. Getting to the gym tomorrow 4sure
I'm there with you, man. I've got a great body, for comedy! lol
I KNOOoowww... That happens to me a lot! (but I love to eat it).
That's impossible... why, I was only 7 when I first saw StarWars in the theater (oh... yeah... um -nevermind).
Not certain whether Matt S. is w/ the co. or not - tho I've not placed an order, Matt was ALWAYS on top of things. http://proActionMedia.com
-finding an old email for a CD/DVD Mfc.
Here at Costco on a Saturday. Doesn't look so bad. Parking was easy. I need to change one file name online, then I'll meet my wife inside.
What was your favorite Holiday Fun? Join me at FB and let me know: http://bit.ly/QNY0
Snow melted. Good news, my wife is driving so I can work on the laptop. Bad news, my wife is driving so I can work on the laptop.
Who are the top 3 individuals you recommend I follow. I like: creativity, genuine-ness, business, funny. Please reply and let me know.
Time to shutt'er down and get to that movie w/my sweets (meaning my wife, not the fudge, toffee, brittle... oh, what the... do it all
Let's not get TOO excited about the rain, @sassyword. In WA, Sunshine is a treat in the winter. Back in SLC, LOVED the rain any day!
Hmm... 48% increase in followers in one day? Don't exactly understand where individuals are coming from.
BlogUpdate- The Greatest American Hero: "It's like a light of a new day-, It came from out of the blu.. http://tinyurl.com/83l3tw
Yay! It's raining. The 2 weeks of snow-cover is beautiful along the bay, but ready for drive-able roads again -off to watch ep#3 of Jericho
Do you know how to do this? I need to let someone have ftp access to my site; but don't want to give access to more than one folder?
Need to get to the GYM! Still snowing outside... guess I'll have another piece of pie. :P
Judging by the girl:guy ratio of your followers, @shopDPO , it's about time your wife joined twitter! :P
